item.title: Using Cloudflare as a Free VPN for Your Network
item.description:
Overview

Cloudflare offers a powerful and often overlooked solution for connecting your devices across different networks: Cloudflare Tunnel. This free service allows you to securely link your home office setup, remote cloud images, and laptops through Cloudflare’s global network without exposing your infrastructure to the public internet.

What is Cloudflare Tunnel?

Cloudflare Tunnel is a service that creates secure, outbound-only connections from your devices to Cloudflare’s edge network. Unlike traditional VPNs, you don’t need to open ports on your firewall or manage complex routingâ€”the tunnel handles all the connectivity for you.
